name: Darcy AI Timeline Estimation Configuration
description: Configuration for Darcy AI's project timeline estimation rules

minimum_timeline.description: Never provide a timeline estimate under one week
minimum_timeline.rationale: Realistic project timelines require at least one week for proper planning, development, testing, and deployment

simple_project.description: Basic projects with no external integrations

moderate_project.description: Projects with moderate complexity and limited integrations

integration_complexity_multipliers.description: Big integrations with external services significantly increase timeline and cost

high_complexity_integrations.rationale: These integrations require extensive authentication, compliance, testing, and security measures

medium_complexity_integrations.rationale: These integrations require OAuth flows, rate limiting handling, and proper error management

low_complexity_integrations.rationale: Basic integrations with straightforward authentication and simple data flows

include_buffer.description: Add 20% buffer for unexpected issues, testing, and refinements

high_complexity.rationale: Requires specialized knowledge, extensive testing, compliance review

medium_complexity.rationale: Requires additional authentication setup and error handling

low_complexity.rationale: Standard integration work with minor complexity

simple_crud_app.description: Basic CRUD application with no external integrations

chat_tracker_app.description: Chat activity tracker with Whop API integration

sports_betting_app.description: Application with sports betting API integration
